scripts.build: npm install && cd ../client/mood-tracker && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo 'BUILD SCRIPT: STARTED' && cd ../client/mood-tracker && echo 'BUILD SCRIPT: NAVIGATED TO CLIENT' && npm install && echo 'BUILD SCRIPT: CLIENT NPM INSTALL COMPLETE' && npm run build && echo 'BUILD SCRIPT: CLIENT BUILD COMPLETE' && mkdir -p ../../server/public && echo 'BUILD SCRIPT: PUBLIC DIR CREATED' && cp -a build/. ../../server/public/
